item.title: Variables and the unit of observation
item.description: Get formatted versions: Word : PDF Orientation Thereâ€™s an expression about how to accomplish a complex, confusing, and difficult task: One step at a time. The purpose of this lesson is to provide you with a step-by-step procedure for working with data. Each step can be straightforward. Some steps involve informing yourself about the data at hand. Some steps require creativity and insight about the real-world system the data represents.
